guide.subtitle: Let's quickly learn how to use this amazing tool
guide.step1.title: Upload Images
guide.step1.description: First, you need to upload two images: one for the 'before' display and one for the 'after' display. The system will automatically blend these two images into one variable image.
guide.step1.tip1: Support drag-and-drop or click to upload
guide.step1.tip2: Support common image formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.
guide.step2.title: View Effect
guide.step2.description: After uploading, the system will automatically generate a variable image. This image has a magical property: it displays 'before' content on white (light) backgrounds and 'after' content on black (dark) backgrounds.
guide.step2.tip: Click the generated image to view the black background effect
guide.step3.title: Download & Use
guide.step3.description: After generation, you can download the PNG image and upload it to various platforms like social media, forums, messaging apps, and more.
guide.step3.usage3: Video thumbnails, blog posts, or any platform with image support
guide.step3.warning: Note: You need to click 'View Original' to see the change effect
